issue.title: [CF 277] About #132 crash
issue.body:
patoyama said Sun Aug 14 2011 01:47:08 GMT+0800 (yesterday) I'm really happy with tmw and it's functionality.. except for one tiny detail:

Clicking okay after editing group settings keeps crashing the game: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2574010/tmwcrash.txt

ideas?

Cybeloras said Sun Aug 14 2011 08:46:24 GMT+0800 (yesterday) What version are you using? Multiple people who were having the same issue reported that the fix implemented in version 4.5.1 solved the problem.

I have some additional information, after I upgrade to version 4.5.1(r181+), it only has crashed once ( i remeber i was change the group row / columns and click Okay). Before upgrade to r181, open the icon editor change everything and click okay will crash (not only for group setting).

I am sure r181+ was fixed everything except the group setting.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #277 | Raw

comments.body:
I suppose this speaks for itself:

v4.5.3

  • Bug Fixes:
    • I accidentally commented out the fix for the error 132 crash. Oops.

Looking back through my archives, it seems I commented it out in r182, and it stayed that way through 4.5.2 release. I think I was testing to see If I could reproduce the error, and forgot to change it back

Edited Aug 15, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

-.-
I will try r196.
Maybe it's need a long long time, you can close this ticket. if i find something about this, i will open a new ticket.

Edited Aug 15, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
